text.__SUMMARY__: Prunus pulgarensis is a species of plant in the family Rosaceae. It is endemic to the Philippines.  It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.Sources: Kalkman, C. (1998). "Prunus pulgarensis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T34266A9854360. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T34266A9854360.en. Retrieved 22 December 2017.
